website_summaries.verdict: The Vasque Inhaler II GTX proved that in terms of traction, comfort, and breathability, it is a boot that hikers can count on the trails. However, its imprecise fit did not appease the others. All in all, the Vasque Inhaler II GTX is an averagely priced light hiker that has qualities to look out for. Those with a wider foot, however, must look somewhere else.
pros: Based on a handful of expert reviews, the Vasque Inhaler II GTX was indeed a lightweight hiking boot
Its little-to-no break-in time was appreciated by a small group of gear testers
Some users acknowledged how the Inhaler II GTX kept their foot dry after wet encounters
Its breathability was superb, according to a lot of hikers
A considerable number of users adored its great grip on wet surfaces
cons: A couple of wearers were frustrated with its narrow fit
An expert found the Inhaler II GTX from Vasque slightly expensive
Some owners were annoyed when they experienced slippage inside the boot

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is a challenge
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great shoe with good tread, but the sizing is a challenge. I typically wear a size 6.5 or 7, but ordered a 7.5 based upon the reviews. The 7.5 is so short, I feel my toes touching the front of the shoe. I can only imagine how small the shoes would feel during or after a hike. Unfortunately, the next size up is about twice as expensive as the size I bought, and outside my price range. I imagine these would make a solid hiking tool for someone who could find the correct size in a suitable price.
customer_reviews.author: SweetCaroline03

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light weight. I sized up by 1/2 size which gives me wiggle room and extra space for socks. The height gives me good ankle support and I can wear them tighter or looser with the easy lacing system.
customer_reviews.author: Retired

customer_reviews.title: Love these hikers
customer_reviews.text: Love these hikers. Great multi-purpose boot. Like the ankle support--also, higher shaft keeps rocks out, too. Lightweight. Felt a little snug across the front of the foot, but now they've loosened up a bit with wear. I wear a size 9 typically in "regular" shoes, a 10 in running shoes. Went with the 10 and like having that room for swelling.
customer_reviews.author: Boot girl

customer_reviews.title: Light and Airy!
customer_reviews.text: These hiking boots feel like my comfy running shoes. I was out to find a pair that were light in weight, yet supportive. This is it! My feet are happy and my legs aren't weighed down. I do, however, put Powersteps in these to give me more arch support, but I do that in all my shoes. I'd highly recommend these boots for all kinds of hiking.
customer_reviews.author: June H.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for hiking and every day!
customer_reviews.text: These are now my favorite boots. They're not made for the cold or anything like that, but they are definitely comfortable and solidly made. I have been wearing them almost everyday and they have become my go-to boots, even when it's cold. Only below freezing temps force me into my winter boots. They have good ankle support, they lace up super fast, and they have not let any water in so far. I'm a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Eubie M. Toro

customer_reviews.title: I have heard nothing but great things about these boots
customer_reviews.text: I can't really give a review on this product. I had to return them because they were too short. ORDER A HALF SIZE LARGER. I ordered my usual size and my toes were at the very end of the boot. Unfortunately Amazon didn't have the size I need in order to reorder give a full review. I have heard nothing but great things about these boots, so I am looking forward to getting them and trying them out.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa N. Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Odd Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I got this a whole size up (I wear a 7 1/2, so I ordered an 8 1/2) based on reviews, and it was still too short in the toe. The toe area is an odd "pointy" shape, which made them uncomfortable. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I took them out for a 3 hour hike. I didn't even have to break them in. Light weight and look good. I ordered a half size up 7 1/2(I wear a 7) like the other reviews suggested. They were right they fit perfect. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is because I didn't test the water proof
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weird painful tongue
customer_reviews.text: The tongue fit weird. It cut into the top of my foot and hurt. I must have retied and repositioned it a hundred times to no avail. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: S. H. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great boots but they run a whole size too small
customer_reviews.text: Great boots but they run a whole size too small. I’m a 7.5 but ordered an 8 and it was still too small. Sending back for 81/2
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: These boots are so comfortable. They give great support to my arch
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so comfortable. They give great support to my arch, are lightweight and I highly recommend them. I do wear an 8 1/2 in most of my shoes, so going by what others said I ordered the 9 and glad I did. They have room for my toes and they are the perfect length. I hope you like them as much as me!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Masterson

customer_reviews.title: the best high top training shoes
customer_reviews.text: these shoes si for hiking? i use it for trail running, training, cardio training. the best high top training shoes. feather light, breathable. i own 5 pair of this. i highly recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: happywife8

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boot for no break in time
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit great and worked amazing for me while hiking the Grand Canyon. I didn’t have time to break in new boots but these were the perfect fit for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Rubbing
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the problem was , the side was rubbing so bad had to send them back may have been defect or my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for new boots to accommodate a healing broken foot. These boots are super comfortable. I wore them straight from the box for 5 hours at work in great comfort. They are lightweight, yet supportive. So good looking that 2 people who saw them that day decided to order themselves a pair. Guess I can't say enough! I haven't tested their waterproofing yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great boot at a great price
customer_reviews.text: First time I ordered without trying on first! It was perfect in every way. I look forward to getting a lot of miles on these boots. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: pamela sharp

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great for hiking. I know Vasque's typically run narrow and a little short, so I just ordered a 1/2 size up and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: kathi sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Elated with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Superior hiking shoes and the style is a bonus. Aside from the brick house construction, the shoe design is feminine and subtle.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 1/2 size up because of reviews. Mistake! These r true to Vasque sizes. I missed my return window 😩
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Kepler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color - perfect for hiking or wearing in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for treking and for casual use! I get complemts on them all the time and the colors match my pack!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2nd pair half size larger than what I usually buy and they fit fine! Used them last weekend and they are terrific, I live them! Have a lot of toe space and very good grab on the surface.
customer_reviews.author: C Abella

customer_reviews.title: Ankle support!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Super comfortable but also extremely supportive of your ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia C. Baladi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the mesh lining. Keeps feet cooler and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kayhik

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome. I wear a size 8-81/2 shoe. Ordered an 81/2 and they fit great. Very lightweight and comfortable. Will be wearing for moderate hiking, snowshoeing... can't wait
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just buy one half size larger than you would normally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe, for hiking and everything
customer_reviews.text: These hiking boots are so comfortable, I'd rather wear them than tennis shoes for everyday use. For hiking, they stay very dry for the amount of mesh, are super lightweight, and have good traction and ankle support. I bought half a size up because I prefer to wear thicker wool socks while hiking. I noticed a little rubbing when I wore thinner socks, but with breaking in that should go away. These are my favorite pair of shoes - I've hiked in the rain through puddles and running water and in the city. Will try to update review after some mountain and beach hiking later this year.
customer_reviews.author: Esther H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and comfortable. Perfect for summer hiking. True to size. Unfortunately I ordered these on prime day after reading reviews I sized up. I wear 8 in street shoes and 8.5 in hiking most of the time. Ordered 9 and they were to big. Wish I got my size. My friend was more then happy to have it for the price and I lost my window of opportunity Now the price is back to normal. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Ewa Nietupska

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots!! Took them on vacation this summer and they smoked my husband's Columbia boots! While he was slipping in some places I never slipped once! And they're adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vasque Womens Inhaler II GTX-W Inhaler Ii GTX
product_meta.description: The lightweight yet durable construction, waterproof protection, and reliable traction of the Vasque® Inhaler II GTX hiking shoe will have you breathing easy on any trail. 1.6 mm PU coated leather and abrasion-resistant 3-D mesh upper provide excellent durability as well as a high level of breathability. Style is ideal for hot weather hiking. GORE-TEX® waterproof, breathable liner with Extended Comfort Technology sets the bar for breathable waterproof protection. Ample ventilation through the mesh uppers pushes heat out and welcomes fresh air in. Molded TPR toe and heel counters are perforated for additional breathability. Dual density EVA footbed for all-day comfort. A lightweight, low-profile EVA midsole with TPU instep shank is a performance-cushioning platform with just the right amount of stability for moving fast on the trail. Vibram® Pneumatic sole is designed with an aggressive lug pattern and molded in Megagrip rubber compound for outstanding trail traction. Last: Equalizer Imported. Measurements: Weight: 15 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Dual density ethylene vinyl acetate footbed
